document.full_text: the adviser, toshiso kosako, said the government had taken only ad hoc measures to contain the crisis at the crippled fukushima nuclear plant.
document.title: asia: japan: senior nuclear adviser resigns, lambasting government's response to crisis
lines_and_colors: the adviser, toshiso kosako, said the government had taken only ad hoc measures to contain the crisis at the crippled fukushima nuclear plant.
